SEARCH
Package src.binary

Class BinarySearchTree

java.lang.Object
src.binary.BinarySearchTree
public class BinarySearchTree extends Object
author:: Awonke Mnotoza version:: 1.0.0 description:: Binary search tree with traversals

      Constructs an empty BinarySearchTree.

    • BinarySearchTree

      public BinarySearchTree(src.Field root)
      Constructs a BinarySearchTree with a specified root field.
      Updates the root field of the binary search tree.
      Parameters:
      root - The Field object to be set as the root of the tree.

      Right child
      Retrieves the right child of the current binary search tree.
      Returns:
      The right child of the current binary search tree.

      public BinarySearchTree getLeftChld()
      Left child
      Retrieves the left child of the current binary search tree.
      Returns:
      The left child of the current binary search tree.

    • getRoot

      public src.Field getRoot()
      Root
      Retrieves the root field of the current binary search tree.
      The root is of type Field.
      Returns:
      The right child of the current binary search tree.
      See Also:
      • Field

    • insertFields

      public BinarySearchTree insertFields(src.Field[] fields)
      Insert fields
      Inserts an array of fields into the binary search tree.
      Parameters:
      fields - An array of Field objects to be inserted into the tree.
      Returns:
      The modified binary search tree after inserting the fields.
      See Also:
      • Field

    • insertField

      public void insertField(BinarySearchTree parent, src.Field field)
      Insert field
      Inserts a field into the binary search tree.

      Time complexity:

      ⌛ | O(logn)
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent node where the field will be inserted.
      field - The Field object to be inserted into the tree.
      See Also:
      • Field

    • preTraverse

      public void preTraverse(BinarySearchTree tree)
      Pre-Order Traverse
      Performs a pre-order traversal of the binary search tree and prints each node's key.
      Parameters:
      tree - The binary search tree to be traversed.

    • inTraverse

      public void inTraverse(BinarySearchTree tree)
      In-Order Traverse
      Performs an in-order traversal of the binary search tree and prints each node's key.
      Parameters:
      tree - The binary search tree to be traversed.

    • postTraverse

      public void postTraverse(BinarySearchTree tree)
      Post-Order Traverse
      Performs a post-order traversal of the binary search tree and prints each node's key.
      Parameters:
      tree - The binary search tree to be traversed.

    • findNode

      public BinarySearchTree findNode(Integer key, BinarySearchTree tree)
      Find Node
      Finds a node with a specific key in the binary search tree.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to search for.
      tree - The binary search tree to be searched.
      Returns:
      The node with the specified key, or null if not found.

    • findNode

      public BinarySearchTree findNode(Integer key, BinarySearchTree tree, String sentence)
      Find Node with Sentence
      Finds a node with a specific key and sentence in the binary search tree.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to search for.
      tree - The binary search tree to be searched.
      sentence - The sentence to match.
      Returns:
      The node with the specified key and sentence, or null if not found.

    • updateField

      public void updateField(Integer key, src.Field newField)
      Update Field
      Updates a field in the binary search tree with a specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the field to be updated.
      newField - The new Field object to replace the existing field.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Convert to string
      Overrides the toString method to generate a string representation of the binary search tree.

      For more information, see the documentation.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the binary search tree.
